flow.descriptionCdata:
25b36369-4e78-49d3-bdbb-0a20e740d540.121fc91d-35e2-41b4-a059-24b12ba4ff45.prompt=User Identifier 25b36369-4e78-49d3-bdbb-0a20e740d540.5c39830f-4f7a-4662-89a6-4363e35175f9.prompt=String to Append \: 25b36369-4e78-49d3-bdbb-0a20e740d540.71da8e81-e917-497e-9165-494048ac3486.description=
Check if there is atleast 2 server components in Deployed State to perform Flexin

Input Parameters\:
serverIds - List of server UUIDs separated by a delimiter
delimiter - the list delimiter.
userIdentifier - OO Application UUID to authorize a REST Call

Responses\:
   success - if there are > 1 valid server
   failure - if there are <\= 1 valid server 

Result Fields\:
 NA
25b36369-4e78-49d3-bdbb-0a20e740d540.899070bf-5279-4b3d-9fb8-3d73eb67c6b0.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
25b36369-4e78-49d3-bdbb-0a20e740d540.d3b543fc-0909-405e-a021-847c3c9db0fa.description=
Iterates through a list of values. If the list changes while running, the updates will be appended to the list.

Inputs\:
separator - The list separator (or delimiter).
list - The list to be split

Responses\:
has more - Another value was in the list, and has been returned.
failure - failed to process the list.
no more - The iterator has gone fully through the list. This response will only be returned once per iteration through the list, a subsequent call to the Iterator will restart the Iteration through the list.

Returns\:
The current element of the list, if the response is has more
25b36369-4e78-49d3-bdbb-0a20e740d540.description=
Get the List of Target Tier and associated Servers for a Application Service Component

Inputs\:
coreHost - the Core host of the ADM 
coreUsername - user name to connect to Core
corePassword - the password to connect to Core
artifactId - Component Id of Application Service Component.
userIdentifier - OO Application UUID to authorize REST Call


Responses\:
   success - if the command completes execution and its exit code is 0
   failure - otherwise

Returns
appTierServerMapping - Formatted String of Tier - Server Mapping separated by \# with list of Servers separated by ,and each Mapping separated by ^
For ex\: Tier1\#Server1,Server2,Server3^ Tier2\#Server4,Server5,Server6
25b36369-4e78-49d3-bdbb-0a20e740d540.e63e8d92-55e0-4271-832e-676c010fa075.description=This workflow returns the artifact's properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ 25b36369-4e78-49d3-bdbb-0a20e740d540.f5b0cea4-0711-4782-976a-dc3900775087.description=
Useful Op to keep a running results.
Takes a string input (resultText) and appends this to a global context key of "runningResults". As a result, the context key whose name is in the keyName input will be appended with the string from the input resultText.

Input Parameters\:
keyName - name of context key to append to
resultText - string input to append
delimiter - (leave blank for none) the delimiter to put between what is already in keyName before appending resultText

Responses\:
success - assigned the context variable

Returns\:
The the value of the context variable it appended to.

Context\:
runningResults

Scriptlet Example\:
currentResults \= scriptletContext.get("runningResults");

if (currentResults \=\= null) {
   currentResults \= resultText;
} else {
   currentResults +\= resultText;
}


scriptletContext.putGlobal("runningResults", currentResults);
25b36369-4e78-49d3-bdbb-0a20e740d540.f7f2d20d-e325-428b-b59e-0508281a53f6.prompt=Artifact ID
flow.name: Get TierMapping
